statements.insert: INSERT INTO my_siteconf (siteid, sitetitle, sitekeywords, sitedescription, sitewriter, siteremark) VALUES ((SELECT ISNULL(MAX(siteid),0)+1 FROM my_siteconf), #sitetitle#, #sitekeywords#, #sitedescription#, #sitewriter#, #siteremark#)
statements.update: UPDATE my_siteconf SET sitetitle=#sitetitle#, sitekeywords=#sitekeywords#, sitedescription=#sitedescription#, sitewriter=#sitewriter#, siteremark=#siteremark# WHERE siteid=#siteid#
statements.select:
SELECT A.siteid, A.sitetitle, A.sitekeywords, A.sitedescription, A.sitewriter, A.siteremark FROM my_siteconf A
A.siteid=#siteid#
A.sitetitle=#sitetitle#
A.sitekeywords=#sitekeywords#
A.sitedescription=#sitedescription#
A.sitewriter=#sitewriter#
A.siteremark=#siteremark#
